tinfour.gwr

Class NeighborhoodPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • tinfour.gwr.NeighborhoodPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<NeighborhoodPoint>, ISamplePoint

    public class NeighborhoodPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISamplePoint, java.lang.Comparable<NeighborhoodPoint>
    Defines a data-container class for holding the results from neighboring point analysis operations.
